title: Capital defined as tools and machinery

content.question: As a factor of production, capital refers to the

choices.label: money available to start a business
stocks and bonds issued by businesses to raise funds
currency in circulation and deposits in financial institutions
tools and machinery used to produce goods and services

content.answer: tools and machinery used to produce goods and services

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe economic concepts, principles, or models.
